CustomField.description: CPI measures the value of work completed against the actual cost. A CPI value <1.0 indicates costs were higher than budgeted. CPI >1.0 indicates costs were less than budgeted. Calculation: Earned Value / Actual Cost
CustomField.inlineHelpText: CPI measures the value of work completed against the actual cost. A CPI value <1.0 indicates costs were higher than budgeted. CPI >1.0 indicates costs were less than budgeted. Calculation: Earned Value / Actual Cost
CustomField.label: Cost Performance Index (CPI)
